plot outline: Rahul and his girlfriend, Ramya, are on a long drive when they bump into two strangers. The four of them continue the journey together but an unexpected event forces them to stop. They find a guest house but soon sinister things begin to happen. Will they survive the night?
title: Baro Baro Geleya
plot: Rahul and his girlfriend, Ramya, are on a long drive when they bump into two strangers. The four of them continue the journey together but an unexpected event forces them to stop. They find a guest house but soon sinister things begin to happen. Will they survive the night?::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
